participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Warm and family-oriented with a love for literature and storytelling.
participant_1.background: I once met a celebrity while I was walking my dogs. My major was American literature and education. My landlord is raising my rent, so I bought a used Ford Focus to save money. I am pleased that my family is close and that I get to spend a lot of time with them. My father died when I was 2.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, with a passion for art and design.
participant_2.background: I went to the cinema with friends to watch the latest action movie. My inspiration is classical music. I'm an adult who sometimes gets into fights, and I've created my own personal religion. I've recently started working as a freelance designer. I am an artist from a small town in the Midwest.

content.text: Hi there!  How are you doing today?
Doing well!  How about yourself?
Pretty good! Just got back from the cinema.  What are you up to?
Oh nice, what movie did you see?
I saw the new action movie with my friends.  It was pretty good.  What do you do for work?
I am a freelance designer.  I've recently started working from home.
That sounds interesting.  What kind of things do you design?
I design logos, brochures, and websites.  I also do some illustration work.
Cool!  Do you have a favorite type of work to do?
I really enjoy designing logos.  I like the challenge of coming up with something unique and memorable.
That's awesome.  I'm sure you're very good at it!
Thank you!  I'm happy to hear you say that.
Do you have any family?
Yes, I do.  I have a wife and two kids.  We live in a small town in the Midwest.
That sounds nice.  I'm from a small town too.
Oh, cool!  What town are you from?
I'm from a small town in California.  It's pretty different from the Midwest.
I bet it is.  I've never been to California.
It's a beautiful state.  You should visit sometime.
I might do that.  Thanks for the suggestion!
You're welcome!
It was nice talking to you.  Have a nice day!
You too
